levels.description: Stops attacking and puts <@ba.vup>{max_target}</> enemies within Attack Range to <$ba.sleep>Sleep</> for <@ba.vup>{sleep}</>s. Afterwards, ASPD <@ba.vup>+{attack_speed}</>, and attacks <@ba.vup>{max_target}</> enemies
